info.title: Company Product Manager
info.description: Fetches products by hierarchy or by title. Future to be extended with more functionality and getters.

method.name: getProductsByHierarchy
method.description: Get all company products inside a given hierarchy id.

parameter.name: $hierarchyID
parameter.description: The hierarchy id to get the products for.

method.returndescription: An array of all product information.

method.name: getProductsByTitle
method.description: Get all company products that match the given title.

parameter.name: $title
parameter.description: The title match. It is an SQL-like match query. Default value is '%'.

method.returndescription: An array of all product information.
